title: 85/61/EEC: Commission Decision of 19 December 1984 amending Decision 84/108/EEC authorizing Member States to permit temporarily the marketing of forestry reproductive material not satisfying the requirements of Council Directive 66/404/EEC
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 19 December 1984
amending Decision 84/108/EEC authorizing Member States to permit temporarily the marketing of forestry reproductive material not satisfying the requirements of Council Directive 66/404/EEC
(85/61/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 84/108/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
In the column 'Quercus sessiliflora Sal.' of the Annex, in the line 'DK', '22 000' is replaced by '42 000'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2326/66.
(2) OJ No L 61, 2. 3. 1984, p. 36.
(3) OJ No L 269, 10. 10. 1984, p. 21.
